PATIENT_ID: TEST_MENTAL_HEALTH_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-16 14:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-16 14:10:00
Category I activation for 32-year-old male. Intentional gunshot wound to abdomen.
Assault victim. Trauma admission. Age 32.
Intentional violent mechanism confirmed. Assaulted by known individual.
BP 88/52, HR 128, RR 24, GCS 14.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-02-16 14:30:00
Patient alert and able to participate in assessment.
Cognitive status: oriented, able to communicate clearly.
Patient reports another person at scene died from same event.
Fatality at scene documented per EMS report.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-16 16:00:00
Exploratory laparotomy performed. Bowel injuries repaired.
Post-operative: hemodynamically stable.
No spinal cord injury. No amputation.
Mental health screening initiated during inpatient admission.
Spiritual care consult placed. Psychosocial screening completed.
